wikipedia_page.main: Roumelia Lane was the pseudonym of Kay Green (born 31 December 1927), under which she was a British writer of over 35 romance novels for Mills & Boon from 1967 to 1997. Other pseudonyms she used were Florissa May, Guy Granger, Katie Kent, and Harley Davis.
